name: resolveVisualCodeType(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the type of code requested by the user.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:

                               with completion: @escaping (INVisualCodeTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
